item.title: 47 doctors suffer foodpoisoning at govtrun hospital
item.description: Fortyseven doctors at governmentrun Sion hospital on Friday fell sick after eating sweets during the Independence Day celebration

item.title: Modi touched upon common issues but like a trueblue PM
item.description: Narendra Modi rose above partisan politics on Independence Day and spoke the way a Prime Minister should His first address from the Red Fort was a study in reconciliation and empathy writes Vinod Sharma
item.itunes:subtitle: Narendra Modi rose above partisan politics on Independence Day and spoke the way a Prime Minister should His first address from the Red Fort was a study in reconciliation and empathy writes Vinod Sharma
item.itunes:summary: Narendra Modi rose above partisan politics on Independence Day and spoke the way a Prime Minister should His first address from the Red Fort was a study in reconciliation and empathy writes Vinod Sharma

item.title: Swaraj arrives in Singapore to bolster ties
item.description: External affairs minister Sushma Swaraj arrived in Singapore on Friday on a twoday visit during which she will hold talks with the top leadership of Singapore including the Prime Minister
item.itunes:subtitle: External affairs minister Sushma Swaraj arrived in Singapore on Friday on a twoday visit during which she will hold talks with the top leadership of Singapore including the Prime Minister
item.itunes:summary: External affairs minister Sushma Swaraj arrived in Singapore on Friday on a twoday visit during which she will hold talks with the top leadership of Singapore including the Prime Minister

item.title: Himachal Heavy rains wreak havoc 6 dead
item.description: Parts of Hamirpur and Una were lashed by incessant heavy rains and four members of a family hailing from West Bengal were swept away by swirling waters of Kuhana Khud in Hamirpur on Friday afternoon

item.title: Unhappy IDay for kin of Bengal workers abducted in Iraq
item.description: It was an unhappy Independence Day on Friday for the families of the two West Bengal workers as they wait for their return after they were abducted by Islamic State IS militants in Iraq
item.itunes:subtitle: It was an unhappy Independence Day on Friday for the families of the two West Bengal workers as they wait for their return after they were abducted by Islamic State IS militants in Iraq
item.itunes:summary: It was an unhappy Independence Day on Friday for the families of the two West Bengal workers as they wait for their return after they were abducted by Islamic State IS militants in Iraq

item.title: Kanpur 450 kids fall ill after eating IDay sweets
item.description: More than 450 children of four primary and junior high schools became seriously sick when they ate ladoos given to them as refreshment after Independence Day celebrations in Chaubeypur
item.itunes:subtitle: More than 450 children of four primary and junior high schools became seriously sick when they ate ladoos given to them as refreshment after Independence Day celebrations in Chaubeypur
item.itunes:summary: More than 450 children of four primary and junior high schools became seriously sick when they ate ladoos given to them as refreshment after Independence Day celebrations in Chaubeypur

item.title: Two killed as incessant rains trigger landslides in Meghalaya
item.description: Two children were killed and three others were injured after their houses collapsed in two different places in Meghalayas East Khasi Hills on Friday after incessant rains in the past 36 hours caused landslides the police said
item.itunes:subtitle: Two children were killed and three others were injured after their houses collapsed in two different places in Meghalayas East Khasi Hills on Friday after incessant rains in the past 36 hours caused landslides the police said
item.itunes:summary: Two children were killed and three others were injured after their houses collapsed in two different places in Meghalayas East Khasi Hills on Friday after incessant rains in the past 36 hours caused landslides the police said

item.title: IPS officer accused in Sohrabuddin encounter case reinstated
item.description: The Gujarat government has reinstated an Indian Police Service IPS officer who is an accused in Sohrabuddin Sheikh fake encounter case and has given him a plum posting as superintendent DGP vigilance squad according to a Gujarat state home department notification issuednbspThursday midnight

item.title: Rains creates havoc in Uttarakhand 16 killed
item.description: Incessant rains in Uttarakhand since Thursday night have claimed 16 people in Pauri and Dehradun districts 14 people have been killed in Pauri district while 2 were killed in Dehradun Most of the rivers in state are flowing above the danger mark
item.itunes:subtitle: Incessant rains in Uttarakhand since Thursday night have claimed 16 people in Pauri and Dehradun districts 14 people have been killed in Pauri district while 2 were killed in Dehradun Most of the rivers in state are flowing above the danger mark
item.itunes:summary: Incessant rains in Uttarakhand since Thursday night have claimed 16 people in Pauri and Dehradun districts 14 people have been killed in Pauri district while 2 were killed in Dehradun Most of the rivers in state are flowing above the danger mark

item.title: Modis Red Fort speech strikes a chord with audience finds HT poll
item.description: After Modi delivered a speech that was high on emotion and measured in political rhetoric HT asked its readers what they thought about the Prime Ministers address Read on to know the results
item.itunes:subtitle: After Modi delivered a speech that was high on emotion and measured in political rhetoric HT asked its readers what they thought about the Prime Ministers address Read on to know the results
item.itunes:summary: After Modi delivered a speech that was high on emotion and measured in political rhetoric HT asked its readers what they thought about the Prime Ministers address Read on to know the results

item.title: MP 53 children taken ill after eating at school
item.description: Fifty three children fell sick after eating food served on Independence Day at a governmentrun primary school at Balapur in Sehore district of Madhya Pradesh on Friday

item.title: Manjhi takes Uturn on corruption targets media
item.description: Bihar chief minister Jitan Ram Manjhi has sought to dismiss the controversy surrounding his earlier statement that even he was forced to give bribe during the chief ministership of Nitish Kumar to rectify an earlier inflated electricity bill
item.itunes:subtitle: Bihar chief minister Jitan Ram Manjhi has sought to dismiss the controversy surrounding his earlier statement that even he was forced to give bribe during the chief ministership of Nitish Kumar to rectify an earlier inflated electricity bill
item.itunes:summary: Bihar chief minister Jitan Ram Manjhi has sought to dismiss the controversy surrounding his earlier statement that even he was forced to give bribe during the chief ministership of Nitish Kumar to rectify an earlier inflated electricity bill

item.title: India gifts ambulances buses to Nepal on IDay
item.description: India gifted 20 ambulances and four buses to various schools hospitals and charitable organisations in Nepal on the occasion of 68th Independence Day on Friday
item.itunes:subtitle: India gifted 20 ambulances and four buses to various schools hospitals and charitable organisations in Nepal on the occasion of 68th Independence Day on Friday
item.itunes:summary: India gifted 20 ambulances and four buses to various schools hospitals and charitable organisations in Nepal on the occasion of 68th Independence Day on Friday

item.title: Rahul not responsible for Congress defeat Antony
item.description: Rejecting criticism about Rahul Gandhis leadership Congress leader A K Antony on Friday said he was not responsible for the partys Lok Sabha poll debacle and exuded optimism that it will revive under Sonia Gandhi and Rahul
item.itunes:subtitle: Rejecting criticism about Rahul Gandhis leadership Congress leader A K Antony on Friday said he was not responsible for the partys Lok Sabha poll debacle and exuded optimism that it will revive under Sonia Gandhi and Rahul
item.itunes:summary: Rejecting criticism about Rahul Gandhis leadership Congress leader A K Antony on Friday said he was not responsible for the partys Lok Sabha poll debacle and exuded optimism that it will revive under Sonia Gandhi and Rahul

item.title: Oppn not Modi biggest contributor to BJPs victory
item.description: Veteran BJP leader L K Advani on Friday gave credit of partys stupendous Lok Sabha election victory to Opposition saying the massive corruption and errors committed by the previous regime in the last ten years contributed to their win
item.itunes:subtitle: Veteran BJP leader L K Advani on Friday gave credit of partys stupendous Lok Sabha election victory to Opposition saying the massive corruption and errors committed by the previous regime in the last ten years contributed to their win
item.itunes:summary: Veteran BJP leader L K Advani on Friday gave credit of partys stupendous Lok Sabha election victory to Opposition saying the massive corruption and errors committed by the previous regime in the last ten years contributed to their win
